attributes.action: Save our NHS Hospitals (North West London)
attributes.additional_details:
Fight to save your intensive care, emergency and maternity units.
We oppose NHS proposals to downgrade health
services in North West London, including the
closure of 44% of our A&E departments in the area.
We want Ealing and Central Middlesex hospitals,
as well as Charing Cross and Hammersmith
hospitals, to retain their status and keep all existing
services, including A&E units.

rejection.details: Please see: stop the planned closing of A&E departments in four west london hospitals
